originalText.text: Hands down, the best dental experience! Myrtle is wonderful! She walked me through every step of my cleaning and answered all my questions. Dr. Merrick was kind and informative and has a wonderful rapport. I was nervous to go in but left relaxed and so assured of my care. I would highly recommend making an appointment.

Dr. Merrick was kind and informative and has a wonderful rapport. I was nervous to go in but left relaxed and so assured of my care. I would highly recommend making an appointment.

originalText.text: Dr. Merrick has NEVER failed me or my family. He is hands down the BEST dentist and cosmetic dentist in New York. If you’re in pain or have an emergency,  his office will help you get right in and Dr .Merrick really takes his time to examine your issue and go over what is happening and what he suggests the service should be. Once agreed upon, he gets to Work!! He is very particular and cares about each individuals pain and concern and even checks up on you after you are home and surprised to get the call! Thank you Dr. Merrick!! And Myrtle is hands down the Best at cleaning and deep cleaning. You come out of this office feeling Great and taken care of. 5 stars isn’t enough!

originalText.text: Dr. Merrick saved my dental life!  I first met him about 10 years ago, when I had fear of dental work and many serious dental issues.  Over the years he has consistently given me patience, clear information about my situation, special techniques to minimize discomfort, and excellent skill and care so that now I have a beautiful and healthy smile - no small achievement!  His chairside manner, humor and personal follow up make taking care of my dental health easy. I have to also compliment Myrtle, who is the most observant and thorough hygienist I have had.

Over the years he has consistently given me patience, clear information about my situation, special techniques to minimize discomfort, and excellent skill and care so that now I have a beautiful and healthy smile - no small achievement!  His chairside manner, humor and personal follow up make taking care of my dental health easy. I have to also compliment Myrtle, who is the most observant and thorough hygienist I have had.

originalText.text: The mouth is an intimate space. Therefore, it is important that the dentist you work with treats you with respect, acknowledges your personhood and is collaborative in their process. I went to Dr. Merrick for an emergency consult. Besides opening for the emergency, he exemplified all those traits during my visit. He walked me through the steps, showed me what he saw, and helped me understand what has happening with my teeth, in very clear, understandable language. It was the best dental consultation I ever had. If all dentist were like this, I would have gone more often as youngster.

originalText.text: Honest and dedicated! Dr. Merrick and Myrtle were both highly professional and caring.  They took the team to explain the problems and procedures, always mindful, that I felt comfortable throughout the process. I look forward to the next visit.  Thank you!
